## Checklist

- [ ] I ran `pnpm lint` and fixed new lint issues
- [ ] I ran `pnpm typecheck` and fixed TS errors
- [ ] I ran `pnpm build` (or validated affected apps/libs)
- [ ] If I touched API/worker logic, I verified queue + rate-limit behavior
- [ ] If I touched Prisma schema/migrations, I documented migration steps
- [ ] If I touched the web UI, I added screenshots (before/after) where relevant
